sentence: The four Republican frontrunners whove registered at more than 10% in recent polling former U.S. attorney Bill McSwain, State Sen. Doug Mastriano, former U.S. Rep. Lou Barletta and businessman Dave White brought in a combined $4.62 million from Jan. 1 to March 28, according to new campaign finance filings.
title: While The GOP Primary Is A MAGA Sh*t Show, Josh Shapiro (D) Brings In $4.5 Million Q1 Haul

sentence: Democratic gubernatorial candidate Pennsylvania Attorney General Josh Shapiro recently launched a campaign advertisement designed to boost state Sen. Doug Mastriano, a Republican candidate some in the party worry may not fare well in the general election.
author: Kate Scanlon
title: Shapiro ad seeks to boost Doug Mastriano in Pennsylvania gubernatorial contest

sentence: As National Committeeman, I have spoken regularly with almost all of the gubernatorial campaigns over the past [three] months,? Andy Reilly told Politico: Last week when the presumptive [Democratic] nominee, Josh Shapiro, and the State Democratic Party used campaign resources to assist the candidacy of Doug Mastriano in the Republican primary, it raised concerns among the campaigns.
author: John Binder
title: 7 Issues Facing Doug Mastriano in Pennsylvania Governor Race

sentence: Pennsylvania Attorney General Josh Shapiro (D), who will face a Republican opponent in the gubernatorial election in November, is currently running an ad to boost GOP primary candidate Doug Mastriano based on the perception that he would be the easiest to defeat, the New York Times reports.
author: John Binder
title: NY Times: Democrat Runs Ad Intended to Help Doug Mastriano Win Pennsylvania GOP Gubernatorial Primary

author: Paul Best
title: Pennsylvania county says some mail-in ballots won't scan due to printing error

author: Eric Lutz
title: Doug Mastrianos GOP Primary Victory Puts Democracy on the Ballot in Pennsylvania

sentence: Shapiro has also benefited from a messy GOP primary, with Republican campaigns and officials waging last-minute talks to coalesce around an alternative to front-runner Doug Mastriano, a state senator whose campaign is mostly centered around unfounded claims of widespread voter fraud in 2020.
author: Tal Axelrod
title: Shapiro skates to Democratic governors nod in Pennsylvania

sentence: Pennsylvania Attorney General Josh Shapiro, the state's Democratic gubernatorial nominee, blasted his Republican general election opponent, conservative state Sen. Doug Mastriano, as "dangerous" and "divisive."
author: John L. Dorman
title: Pennsylvania Democratic gubernatorial nominee Josh Shapiro blasts GOP opponent Doug Mastriano as 'dangerous' and 'extreme'

sentence: He will now face state Sen. Doug Mastriano (R), who has the backing of former President Trump, in the general election.
author: Mychael Schnell
title: Shapiro says he would welcome Biden to Pennsylvania amid gubernatorial race

sentence: Pennsylvania Attorney General Josh Shapiro (D) on Sunday said Pennsylvania state Sen. Doug Mastriano (R), whom he will face in the commonwealths gubernatorial race, is dangerous? and divisive.? During an interview with co-anchor Dana Bash on CNNs State of the Union,? Shapiro called out Mastriano for a number of policy stances, including abortion, and noted the state lawmakers presence in Washington on Jan. 6, 2021. He is extreme and he is dangerous.
author: Mychael Schnell
title: Shapiro calls Mastriano dangerous and divisive
